roleset.name: to weep, cry
roleset.note: SOB-V NOTES: Based on survey of sentences in WSJ. Member of VNcls nonverbal_expression-40.2. (from sob.01-v)

example.name: intransitive
example.text: Yet there will be people who-1 [*T*-1] will sob at `` Immediate Family , '' a limply constructed and offensive movie about adoption .
example.arg: at `` Immediate Family , '' a limply constructed and offensive movie about adoption

roleset.name: short of breath
roleset.note: SOB-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on medi-tmprl1to8. (from sob.01-j)

role.descr: entity who can't catch their breath
